overview: This file controls the experience required for each level by each class

data_fields.name: Level
data_fields.description: This is a reference field to define the level

data_fields.name: Amazon
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Amazon class

data_fields.name: Sorceress
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Sorceress class

data_fields.name: Necromancer
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Necromancer class

data_fields.name: Paladin
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Paladin class

data_fields.name: Barbarian
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Barbarian class

data_fields.name: Druid
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Druid class

data_fields.name: Assassin
data_fields.description: Controls the experience required for each level with the Assassin class

data_fields.name: ExpRatio
data_fields.description: This multiplier affects the percentage of experienced earned, based on the level (Calculated in 1024ths by default, but this can be changed by updating the “10” value in the “Maxlvl” row)
